segments.text: Welcome to our factory . My name is Tiang Had and I'll show you around here.First we'll take a look at the workshop which produces food thermometers . Please , this way .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Has all the work done by men been replaced by automatic computers ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are the batteries in it made by your people ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , they are from other factories .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What kind of battery is it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is lithium which can be used for over three years .
segments.speaker: S1
